Name: Shazar
description: Shazar is a hardworking tractor driver and farmer from Wazirabad. He is 26 years old and married. His wife is a housewife who helps him with the farming activities. He has been driving a tractor for 6 years now. He is the sole earner in the family. He uses his tractor for agricultural purposes like transporting agricultural produce, manure, urea, and other items to different locations. A proper fuel supply is important to ensure that transportation is not hindered. But he cannot afford to buy fuel due to financial constraints. Therefore, he has applied for a loan to help him buy fuel for transporting agricultural products.
